app.name: 3D Pinball Space Cadet
app.long_description:
Port of the 3D Pinball - Space Cadet that came bundled with Windows from Windows 95 until Windows XP.
Wii Remote Controls: A: Launch the ball Z: Move the left paddle B: Move the right paddle DPAD Left, Right, Up Bump table -: Start a new game +: Pause
GameCube Pad Controls: A: Launch the ball L: Move the left paddle R: Move the right paddle DPAD Left, Right, Up: Bump table Y: Start a new game Start: Pause
